DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate pharmacokinetics CP-690,550 subject mild , moderate severe renal impairment , require hemodialysis , compare healthy control .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Of CP-690,550 In Patients With Impaired Renal Function
DOC.criteria: Subjects normal renal function : Subjects must healthy estimate creatinine clearance > 80 mL/min Subjects renal impairment : Subjects good general health commensurate population chronic kidney disease Kidney transplant patient Subjects condition possibly affect drug absorption Subjects malignancies exception adequately treat basal cell carcinoma skin
